text: (he nabee!) aap kah den ki mere paalanahaar ne to keval khule tatha chhupe kukarmon, paap tatha avaidh vidroh ko hee haî€¼raam (varjit) kiya hai tatha is baat ko ki tum use allaah ka saajhee banao, jisaka koee tark usane nahin utaara hai tatha allaah par aisee baat bolo, jise tum nahin jaanate
